ja386:1.2: vastaṃ → bhastaṃ (bj, pts-vp-pli1); kalakaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed); garaṃ (mr)
ja386:2.1: Tvaṃ khopi → tvaṃ nu kho (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed); tvaṃ ca kho (pts-vp-pli1)
ja386:3.1: Aparampi samma te bālyaṃ → ayampi samma te bālo (mr)
ja386:5.2: bhariyāya yo padassati → bhariyā yo padassati (pts-vp-pli1); bhariyā na bhavissati (mr)
ja386:6.1: Na ve piyammeti → na piyammeti (sya1ed, sya2ed); na piyameti (mr); na piyamedanti (katthaci)
